channel.title: Some noob RSPS questions
channel.description:
To start, I know Java, and I've been working with Java for a few years now, but I'm new to RSPS Development. I'm looking to make my own RSPS Software from scratch, but I had a few noob questions to ask about it before I start.
1) What's the difference between all the server versions(ie 317, 508, etc)? 2) Is there anywhere I can find information about the RSPS Protocol(ie packets, login procedure, etc)? 3) You can post any helpful tips/advice/suggestions here

item.title: Some noob RSPS questions
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:6, topic:531117”][quote author=Revamp dis Shit link=topic=649882.msg4365223#msg4365223 date=1379529527]

  1. A very basic answer would be the graphics between them…the higher up revision are the more recent versions (or atleast graphics) from RS
  2. Try looking at this - http://rsps.wikia.com/wiki/317_Protocol
  3. Just ask some more specific questions and I’ll do my best to help ya out
    [/quote]

At least post the correct wikia site for the protocol, we have one hosted for a reason.

http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=Category:RS2[/quote]
atleast…idc

Read full topic

item.title: Some noob RSPS questions
item.dc:creator: @neonrainbowrabbit neonrainbowrabbit
item.description:
@neonrainbowrabbit wrote:

Loveandpower:

@ #2 : http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=Main_Page

Thanks! This one appears more organized.
